mapper.sql: id AS "id", client AS "client", pur_docItem_no AS "purDocitemNo", pur_doc_no AS "purDocNo", purchase_req_no AS "purchaseReqNo", item_no AS "itemNo", pur_stock_bill_id AS "purStockBillId", buy_list_str_des AS "buyListStrDes", created_by AS "createdBy", created_date AS "createdDate", doc_date AS "docDate", estimated_price_indic AS "estimatedPriceIndic", item_delivery_date AS "itemDeliveryDate", mat_brand AS "matBrand", mtl_no AS "mtlNo", net_value AS "netValue", ord_price_unit AS "ordPriceUnit", ord_type AS "ordType", plant AS "plant", price AS "price", promotion AS "promotion", proposer_desc AS "proposerDesc", proposer_id AS "proposerId", pur_grp AS "purGrp", pur_grp_desc AS "purGrpDesc", pur_org AS "purOrg", purdocheader_id AS "purdocheaderId", purdocitem_id AS "purdocitemId", quantity AS "quantity", remark AS "remark", remark1 AS "remark1", store_location AS "storeLocation", vendor_desc AS "vendorDesc", vendor_no AS "vendorNo", phone AS "phone", req_phone AS "reqPhone", plant_des AS "plantDes", store_location_des AS "storeLocationDes", sizeco_l AS "sizecoL", unit_des AS "unitDes", created_by_desc AS "createdByDesc", state_desc AS "stateDesc", di_opertype AS "diOpertype", di_batch AS "diBatch", di_updatetime AS "diUpdatetime",sizeco_l AS "sizecoL"
mapper.select:
select
from faw_purchase_order where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and client like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.client},'%')
and pur_docItem_no like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purDocitemNo},'%')
and pur_doc_no like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purDocNo},'%')
and purchase_req_no like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purchaseReqNo},'%')
and item_no like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemNo},'%')
and pur_stock_bill_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purStockBillId},'%')
and buy_list_str_des like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.buyListStrDes},'%')
and created_by like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createdBy},'%')
and created_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createdDate},'%')
and doc_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.docDate},'%')
and estimated_price_indic like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.estimatedPriceIndic},'%')
and item_delivery_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemDeliveryDate},'%')
and mat_brand like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.matBrand},'%')
and mtl_no like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mtlNo},'%')
and net_value like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.netValue},'%')
and ord_price_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.ordPriceUnit},'%')
and ord_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.ordType},'%')
and plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and promotion like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.promotion},'%')
and proposer_desc like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.proposerDesc},'%')
and proposer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.proposerId},'%')
and pur_grp like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purGrp},'%')
and pur_grp_desc like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purGrpDesc},'%')
and pur_org like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purOrg},'%')
and purdocheader_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purdocheaderId},'%')
and purdocitem_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purdocitemId},'%')
and quantity like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.quantity},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
and remark1 like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark1},'%')
and store_location like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storeLocation},'%')
and vendor_desc like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.vendorDesc},'%')
and vendor_no like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.vendorNo},'%')
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.phone},'%')
and req_phone like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.reqPhone},'%')
and plant_des like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plantDes},'%')
and store_location_des like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storeLocationDes},'%')
and sizeco_l like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizecoL},'%')
and unit_des like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.unitDes},'%')
and created_by_desc like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createdByDesc},'%')
and state_desc like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stateDesc},'%')
and di_opertype like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diOpertype},'%')
and di_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diBatch},'%')
and di_updatetime like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diUpdatetime},'%')

and store_location_des like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storeLocationDes},'%')
and sizeco_l like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizecoL},'%')
and unit_des like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.unitDes},'%')
and created_by_desc like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createdByDesc},'%')
and state_desc like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stateDesc},'%')
and di_opertype like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diOpertype},'%')
